abstract: Wayne Rooney, father of Manchester United striker who shares his name, is among nine men arrested as part of investigation into suspicious bets placed on Scottish soccer league match.
snippet: The father of Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney was one of nine men arrested as part of an investigation into suspicious bets placed on a Scottish league match in December.
lead_paragraph: The father of Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney was one of nine men arrested as part of an investigation into suspicious bets placed on a Scottish league match in December.
